thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Countrywide Says ‍Alison Platt Has Resigned As CEO​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Countrywide Says ‍Alison Platt Has Resigned As CEO​
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Countrywide Plc:
* ‍ALISON PLATT HAS RESIGNED AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF GROUP AND WILL STAND DOWN FROM BOARD​
* ‍BOARD HAS ASKED PETER LONG TO BECOME EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN TO WHICH HE HAS AGREED UNTIL SUCH TIME AS A SUCCESSOR IS APPOINTED​
* ‍PAUL CREFFIELD, PREVIOUSLY MANAGING DIRECTOR, COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT HAS BEEN APPOINTED GROUP OPERATIONS DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
